step.cmd: Patch-test cleaners on all panel surfaces by applying a small amount with a cotton swab to the hidden areas of each panel.
Apply the cleaning solution to a lint-free rag, and then rub it onto the typewriter panels in thin, circular motions. Repeat until the panels are as clean as you want
Apply cleaning solution to a cotton swab, and gently clean around any labels, decals, or model/branding names with extra caution to avoid removing the label paint.
Apply cleaning solution to a new cotton swab, and gently clean typewriter keys and knobs, repeating with a fresh cotton swab as needed.
Dampen a lint-free cloth with clean water and wipe down the panels to remove any excess cleaner.
Wipe down the panels with a dry cloth, and set them in direct sunlight, or in front of a fan, for a few hours to a couple of days to fully dry.
